reviews.review_text:
Nawab’s Multi-Cuisine Restaurant truly exemplifies how passion in the kitchen can elevate dining to an unforgettable experience. The chef here is not only incredibly talented but also one of the most genuine people I’ve met. Hearing him share his journey in culinary excellence was inspiring—his passion for cooking and love for his craft shines in every dish.

We ordered chicken fried rice and chicken lollipop, and to our surprise, he brought out an extra dish: a schezwan garlic sauce that was next-level amazing. It complemented our meal perfectly, adding a depth of flavor that was truly unique. The chicken fried rice was packed with robust, layered flavors, and the chicken lollipop was perfectly crispy on the outside and juicy within.

Every dish tasted authentic, crafted with high-quality ingredients and a level of care that’s rare to find. The chef’s humble demeanor and his commitment to serving only his best made our experience memorable.

Nawab’s is undoubtedly a hidden gem that deserves more recognition for the incredible food and hospitality it offers. If you’re in the area, this is one spot you don’t want to miss—great flavors, exceptional service, and a chef whose passion makes each meal unforgettable.

Visited Nawab's multicuisine restaurant  today, food was realy good. The owner brief history on the board about himself very much reflects his commitment and passion towards serving authentic food.  Excellent food .  100/100
The Hyderabadi style biryani was a flavor explosion with its complex spice mix, the meat was incredibly tender and the rice was cooked to a perfect. Very tasty biryani in goa
